channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Woman killed in suspected mountain lion attack while hiking in northern Colorado
item.description: A woman was killed in a suspected mountain lion attack while she was hiking alone in the mountains of northern Colorado

item.title: Indiana beats Alabama 38-3 in the Rose Bowl to advance to the College Football Playoff semifinals
item.description: Indiana beats Alabama 38-3 in the Rose Bowl to advance to the College Football Playoff semifinals

item.title: Trump wants to overhaul the 'president's golf course.' He hasn't played there yet

item.title: Rain soaks Rose Parade in California and snow squalls hit Midwest and Northeast on first day of 2026
item.description: Rained poured down on the iconic Rose Parade for the first time in 20 years
